author: IndependenceLocalSchools
title: Mark Guinto inducted into Independence High School Athletic Hall of Fame: Community voices
text: Congratulations to Mark Guinto, Independence High School Class of 2004, who was recently inducted into the Independence Athletic Hall of Fame for his outstanding athletic performance throughout his years as a Blue Devil.  He was recognized at a ceremony/luncheon on...
